Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCRED2 WHERE IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY PROYCODI DESC

INSERT INTO CAM_ITCRED2 ( ITCRED2CODI, PROYCODI, LINEA, BARRAE, BARRAR, NTERNAS, TRAMO, ELECTRODUCTO, LONGITUD, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :ITCRED2CODI, :PROYCODI, :LINEA, :BARRAE, :BARRAR, :NTERNAS, :TRAMO, :ELECTRODUCTO, :LONGITUD, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )

UPDATE CAM_ITCRED2 SET PROYCODI = :PROYCODI, LINEA = :LINEA, BARRAE = :BARRAE, BARRAR = :BARRAR, NTERNAS = :NTERNAS, TRAMO = :TRAMO, ELECTRODUCTO = :ELECTRODUCTO, LONG = :LONG, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE ITCRED2CODI = :ITCRED2CODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCRED2 ORDER BY ITCRED2CODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
UPDATE CAM_ITCRED2 SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE PROYCODI = :ID AND IND_DEL = '0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCRED2 WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY ITCRED2CODI ASC
